Extracted Variables:
- \( x \): number of light grilled cheese sandwiches
- \( y \): number of heavy grilled cheese sandwiches

Extracted Constraints:
- Bread: \( 2x + 3y \leq 300 \) (available slices of bread)
- Cheese: \( 3x + 5y \leq 500 \) (available slices of cheese)
- Heavy sandwiches minimum requirement: \( y \geq 3x \) (at least 3 times as many heavy sandwiches as light sandwiches)

Extracted Objective:
- Minimize total production time: \( 10x + 15y \) (minutes to make each type of sandwich)
